Uses of Interface
org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper.Deserializer

Packages that use Deserializer
org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper This package provides classes for Java Bean to RDF mapping. 
 

Uses of Deserializer in org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper
 

Subinterfaces of Deserializer in org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper
 interface CriteriaDeserializer
          Defines a deserializer applicable on a specific type of classes.
 

Classes in org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper that implement Deserializer
 class ArrayDeserializer
          Default deserializer for Java arrays.
 class BaseDeserializer
          Useful base class for writing a Deserializer.
 class BeanDeserializer
          Bean deserializer implementation.
 class CollectionDeserializer
          Default deserializer for Collections.
 class EnumDeserializer
          Default deserializer for enumerations.
 class PrimitiveDeserializer
          Primitive class deserializer.
 class SequenceDeserializer
          Base class for RDF sequence deserialization.
 class StaticBeanDeserializer
          Static deserializer for a generic Bean.
 

Methods in org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper that return Deserializer
 Deserializer DeserializationContext.getDeserializerFor(Class clazz, Annotation[] annotations)
          Returns the deserializer for the given class.
